title: These Walls
lyrics:
[intro] 
(G) (Gmaj7) (C) (Cm)
(G) (Gmaj7) (C) (Cm) 

(G)Maybe we should switch careers
'Cause, baby, you know (C)no one beats our poker faces
And (G)when the night ends up in tears
Wake up and we (C)blame it all on being wasted

[pre-chorus]
(Em)Oh-(G)oh, this love is (C)fading
(Em)So-o-o-(G)o much we're not (C)saying

[chorus]
But if these walls could (G)talk,  
(They'd say) "e(Gmaj7)nough", (they'd say) "give (C)up"
If these walls could (G)talk
(They'd say) "you (Gmaj7)know", (they'd say) "you're (C)fucked"
It's not supposed to hurt this (Am)much
Oh, (D)if these walls could (Am)talk
They'd (Cm)tell us to break (G)up (these walls)
(Gmaj7) (These walls), (C) (these walls)
They'd (Cm)tell us to break (G)up (these walls)
(Gmaj7) (These walls), (C) (these walls)
(Cm) (These walls)

They (G)tell us: "Go and face your fears"
It's getting worse the (C)longer that we stay together
We (G)call it love, but hate it here
Did we really (C)mean it when we said forever?

[pre-chorus]
(Em)Oh-(G)oh, this love is (C)fading
(Em)So-o-o-(G)o much we're not (C)saying

[chorus]
But if these walls could (G)talk,  
(They'd say) "e(Gmaj7)nough", (they'd say) "give (C)up"
If these walls could (G)talk
(They'd say) "you (Gmaj7)know", (they'd say) "you're (C)fucked"
It's not supposed to hurt this (Am)much
Oh, (D)if these walls could (Am)talk
They'd (Cm)tell us to break (G)up (these walls)
(Gmaj7) (These walls), (C) (these walls)
They'd (Cm)tell us to break (G)up (these walls)
(Gmaj7) (These walls), (C) (these walls)
They'd (Cm)tell us to break (Am)up

[bridge]
You don't wanna (Bm)go (Go)
Don't wanna (C)stop (Stop)
Heaven knows (Am)I (I)
Don't wanna (Bm)be the one to cut it (C)off

[chorus]
But if these walls could (G)talk,  
(They'd say) "e(Gmaj7)nough", (they'd say) "give (C)up" (Give it up, give it up, give it up)
If these walls could (G)talk
(They'd say) "you (Gmaj7)know", (they'd say) "you're (C)fucked"  
                                            (Yeah, you know, yeah, you know you're fucked)
It's not supposed to hurt this (Am)much
Oh, (D)if these walls could (Am)talk
They'd (Cm)tell us to break (G)up (these walls)
(Gmaj7) (These walls), (C) (these walls)
They'd (Cm)tell us to break (G)up (these walls)
(Gmaj7) (These walls), (C) (theyâ€™d tell us)
(Cm) (To break up) (G) [end]
